PROJECT(ZNZLIB)

include_directories ( ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/../../zlib/ )

SET(ZNZLIB_SRC znzlib.c)
INCLUDE_REGULAR_EXPRESSION("^.*$")

SET(NIFTI_ZNZLIB_NAME ${PACKAGE_PREFIX}znz)

ADD_LIBRARY(${NIFTI_ZNZLIB_NAME} ${ZNZLIB_SRC} )
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES( ${NIFTI_ZNZLIB_NAME} ${NIFTI_ZLIB_LIBRARIES} zlib)
